languages.text: {n}Задумчивость, прежде посещавшая лица Паскаля, уступила место целеустремленной решимости.{/n} "{name}, благодарю тебя за помощь в {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}разрешении вопроса{/d} о существовании Коллектива Амарнат. Я этого не забуду".

{n}The pensive expression that used to frequent Pasqal's faces has given way to purposeful resolve.{/n} "Thank you, {name}, for your help in {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}settling the issue{/d} of the Amarnat Collective's existence. I will remember it."
languages.original_text: {n}Задумчивость, прежде посещавшая лица Паскаля, уступила место целеустремленной решимости.{/n} "{name}, благодарю тебя за помощь в {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}разрешении вопроса{/d} о существовании Коллектива Амарнат. Я этого не забуду".

traits.locale_text: {n}The pensive expression that used to frequent Pasqal's faces has given way to purposeful resolve.{/n} "Thank you, {name}, for your help in settling the issue of the Amarnat Collective's existence. I will remember it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The pensive expression that used to frequent Pasqal's faces has given way to purposeful resolve.{/n} "Thank you, {name}, for your help in {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}settling the issue{/d} of the Amarnat Collective's existence. I will remember it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡脸上惯常的沉思表情，如今已经被充满目的的决心取代。{/n}“谢谢你，{name}。谢谢你帮忙{d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}解决了阿玛纳特聚合意识的问题{/d}，我会牢牢铭记在心。”
languages.original_text: {n}The pensive expression that used to frequent Pasqal's faces has given way to purposeful resolve.{/n} "Thank you, {name}, for your help in {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}settling the issue{/d} of the Amarnat Collective's existence. I will remember it."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡脸上惯常的沉思表情，如今已经被充满目的的决心取代。{/n}“谢谢你，{name}。谢谢你帮忙解决了阿玛纳特聚合意识的问题，我会牢牢铭记在心。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La expresión pensativa habitual en los rostros de Pasqal ha dado paso a una firme determinación.{/n} «Gracias, {name}, por ayudar a {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}resolver el asunto{/d} de la existencia del Colectivo Amarnat. Lo recordaré».
languages.original_text: {n}The pensive expression that used to frequent Pasqal's faces has given way to purposeful resolve.{/n} "Thank you, {name}, for your help in {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}settling the issue{/d} of the Amarnat Collective's existence. I will remember it."

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión pensativa habitual en los rostros de Pasqal ha dado paso a una firme determinación.{/n} «Gracias, {name}, por ayudar a resolver el asunto de la existencia del Colectivo Amarnat. Lo recordaré».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}これまで物思いにふけっていたパスカルの表情が、今は目的意識に満ちた決意に変わっている。{/n}「感謝する、{name}。アマルナト集合体の存在に{d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}決着をつけてくれた{/d}こと、忘れずにいよう」
languages.original_text: {n}The pensive expression that used to frequent Pasqal's faces has given way to purposeful resolve.{/n} "Thank you, {name}, for your help in {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}settling the issue{/d} of the Amarnat Collective's existence. I will remember it."

traits.locale_text: {n}これまで物思いにふけっていたパスカルの表情が、今は目的意識に満ちた決意に変わっている。{/n}「感謝する、{name}。アマルナト集合体の存在に{d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}決着をつけてくれた{/d}こと、忘れずにいよう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der nachdenkliche Ausdruck, der früher auf Pasqals Gesichtern lag, ist einer zielgerichteten Entschlossenheit gewichen.{/n} "Danke, {name}, für Eure Hilfe dabei, {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}das Problem der Existenz des Amarnat-Kollektivs zu beheben{/d}. Ich werde sie nicht vergessen."
languages.original_text: {n}The pensive expression that used to frequent Pasqal's faces has given way to purposeful resolve.{/n} "Thank you, {name}, for your help in {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}settling the issue{/d} of the Amarnat Collective's existence. I will remember it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der nachdenkliche Ausdruck, der früher auf Pasqals Gesichtern lag, ist einer zielgerichteten Entschlossenheit gewichen.{/n} "Danke, {name}, für Eure Hilfe dabei, das Problem der Existenz des Amarnat-Kollektivs zu beheben. Ich werde sie nicht vergessen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'air pensif qu'arbore habituellement Pasqal a laissé place à une détermination résolue.{/n} « {name}, merci de m'avoir aidé à {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}régler la question{/d} de l'existence du collectif Amarnat. Je saurai m'en souvenir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The pensive expression that used to frequent Pasqal's faces has given way to purposeful resolve.{/n} "Thank you, {name}, for your help in {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}settling the issue{/d} of the Amarnat Collective's existence. I will remember it."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air pensif qu'arbore habituellement Pasqal a laissé place à une détermination résolue.{/n} « {name}, merci de m'avoir aidé à régler la question de l'existence du collectif Amarnat. Je saurai m'en souvenir. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The pensive expression that used to frequent Pasqal's faces has given way to purposeful resolve.{/n} "Thank you, , for your help in settling the issue of the Amarnat Collective's existence. I will remember it."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın yüzünde eskiden sık sık görülen endişeli ifade, yerini belli bir amaca yönelik kararlılığa bırakmış.{/n} "Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nün varlığı {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}konusundaki{/d} yardımlarınız için için teşekkürler {name}. Bunu unutmayacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}The pensive expression that used to frequent Pasqal's faces has given way to purposeful resolve.{/n} "Thank you, {name}, for your help in {d|Encyclopedia:CompPasqal_Ego}settling the issue{/d} of the Amarnat Collective's existence. I will remember it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın yüzünde eskiden sık sık görülebilen endişeli ifade, yerini belli bir amaca yönelik bir kararlılığa bırakmış.{/n} "Teşekkürler {name}. Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nün varlığı konusunu sonuca ulaştırmaya yardımcı olduğunuz için. Bunu unutmayacağım."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
